participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and ambitious, she strives to support her talented daughter while managing her own career.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i am a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i enjoy going to the park. i am now looking for a new job.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate and somewhat adventurous, he dreams big and is eager to leave his small-town roots behind.
participant_2.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i dream of moving to the city. i'm from a small town.

content.text: Well hello there! I like to watch movies and watch movies
